rComments: Dr. Ritola has high expectations, but she help you to improve. The assignments are challenging, but you can write drafts to get better. She gives good feedback, especially in office hour. I enjoyed this class tremendously. She cares about all of her students and it shows in her lectures.

Dr. Ritola is very kind, intelligent, and thoughtful of individual student's needs. She assigns an average amount of homework and essays. She leads interesting classes, occasionally lectures, and involves stimulating writing exercises. I hope to take a class taught by her again because she is very inspirational and motivational.

take this professor. hands down one of the best professors I have ever had. she is extremely passionate about what she does and it shows because I learned incredible amounts from her. writing isn't bland to me anymore, writing is everywhere and it is beautiful. thank you ritola, ucsc needs more professors like her.

Amazing professor!!! If she's teaching writing 2, take her class! She's very helpful and very passionate about what she teaches. If you have any troubles in writing, go to her office hours. If you wanna learn stuff and are willing to work, take her class. Sarcastic sometimes. Well, it's a sign of being smart and is pretty hilarious if you get it.

Ritola is an amazing professor! She really cares about her students and is very encouraging.  She let us write about what we cared about so that we wouldn't get bored doing it  and had constant one-on-one interaction to help us. She put us into groups to have us help each other, which was actually very helpful. I 100% recommend her as a professor.

She is a really nice teacher and is helpful. You have to be active and ask questions when needed. She is very willing to help on improving your papers. She is a tough grader though but still possible to get an A.

Instructions are very clear and easy to understand. Her core class helped me pass the AWPE. Not only is she great at teaching, she's very understanding and cares for her students; she wants you to pass. She encourages office hours (I've gone to two). MUST PARTICIPATE FOR BETTER LEARNING EXPERIENCE; she considers this for your final grade.
Definitely a good class, one that helps you adjust to college level writing expectations. Feedback is really helpful too! Lots of reading, though.

Always ready to help and provides exceptional feedback. Her teaching makes the class bearable even though you might hate it. Overall very enthusiastic about writing and will help you. There are a lot of assignments and essays but are well-structured

I have to be honest in saying that I don't love writing, but I did enjoy Dr. Ritola. Like, a lot. She's passionate, and she cares about how her students perform. I know that I passed the AWPE because I took her class. You will have to work hard for your grade, though. She's tough but helpful. You need to talk in class. Silence is not an option.
